H0.text: Who is the author of the 'Harry Potter' books. Philip Pullman

H1.text: Who is the author of the 'Harry Potter' books. Neil Gaiman

H2.text: Who is the author of the 'Harry Potter' books. C.S. Lewis

H3.text: Who is the author of the 'Harry Potter' books. J.K.R.

A4.text: J. K. Rowling wrote the seven-volume Harry Potter series.

A5.text: J. K. Rowling is the author of the Harry Potter books.

A6.text: Harry Potter is a series of seven fantasy novels written by British author J. K. Rowling.

A7.text: Rowling completed Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone in 1995 and the manuscript was sent off to several prospective agents.
